ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: I have NEVER seen the bloody Squire.  One night I decided I would meet the Squire once and for all and I planted myself up on the ledge in the corner near that
ygData.messageBody:
I have NEVER seen the bloody Squire. One night I decided I would meet the
Squire once and for all and I planted myself up on the ledge in the corner
near that alcove and started reading a book. 18 minutes, kill PH, kill
other 2 frog shaman as they spawn (spread em out to pop one after another).
Read book, rinse, repeat. Four hours pass, nothing but placeholders...still
have never seen even a corpse from the Squire to this day. Nice random
number generator at work ;-)

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:12 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
> The spot is an 18 min spawn (like most of them in Upper Guk).
> Scryer shows
> up about every 4 th or 5th time iirc. Woven grass is the
> common, shimmering
> orb is uncommon (1 in 10???). Easy enough to camp Scryer and
> Warden (elf
> hide gloves & troll hide belt) and scryer. Squire too - if
> you can find his
> spot (i dont know him was well).
>
> Sylly.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 10:48 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
> > I've never even seen the Scryer, except one time as a
> corpse when I was
> > exploring as a youngin. The few times I have been in the
> room talking to
> > campers he hasn't ever popped. How rare a spawn is he?
> Always wanted one
> > of them glowing shield thingees, just never could justify
> the cost. Now
> if
> > I could just get John to quantify the damage reduction one
> would see by
> > raising their AC by 5-6%...
> >
> > Kit
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 9:41 AM

> run
> > by him to get to lower guk, oh look he's up and has a fork,
> kill /gu ok
> who
> > needs a fork...
> >
> > I've killed him 3 times just runnin by him, and camped him
> for 1 once too.
> > traded one for black embroided sleeves. and gave 2 of em to buddies
> >
> > Rakka
> > Sol Ro
